original_text: Now when he had made an end of measuring the inner house, he brought me forth toward the gate whose prospect is toward the east, and measured it round about.
korean_text: 그가 안에 있는 성전 측량하기를 마친 후에 나를 데리고 동쪽을 향한 문의 길로 나가서 사방 담을 측량하는데

sentences.original_text: Now when he had made an end of measuring the inner house
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 안쪽 집 측량을 마쳤을 때

sentences.original_text: toward the gate whose prospect is toward the east
